notes: World-readable Google Sheet with geographical master data for Guinea, including ADM1/2/3 p-codes and links to GeoJSON shape files.  HXL tagged.  Also includes list of known Guinea health facilities, a list of IPC partner organisations, and code lists for sector (public/private) and infection-control training type.  Used by the [Guinea health facility training activities](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/guinea-health-facility-training-activities) dataset.
